## OptimisticHttpRequest.apiUrl property

The url suffix of the api endpoint. Gets appended to base url provided with [OPTIMISTIC\_BASE\_API\_URL](./optimistic-http.optimistic_base_api_url.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apiUrl: string;
```
